channel.title: Speech Recognition on FinanClub

item.title: SOUN
item.description: score:151 Chances: SoundHound AI reported substantial year-over-year gains in its financial results for 2023, showing strong revenue growth of 47% from the previous year. The company’s innovative in-vehicle voice assistant utilizing a large language model completely on the edge while running on the NVIDIA DRIVE platform demonstrates a commitment to cutting-edge technology and potential for market growth.
